title: Stetson Since 1865 Trucker Cap Men |
features: 100% COTTON // Lightweight and skin-friendly renewable cotton fibers excel on warm summer days with temperature-regulating properties
BREATHABLE MESH // The trucker cap is a real classic that will win you over with excellent air circulation ensured by the mesh panel in the back
ADJUSTABLE SIZE // The snapback closure allows the size of the men's cap to be easily adjusted for a snug fit
SOURCE OF SHADE // With the baseball cap on your head, you don't have to hide from the sun. The long peak provides soothing shade and reliably protects the face from the sun's rays
VINTAGE LOOK // This design of the baseball cap shows that it is a trend-conscious all-rounder that can be easily combined with urban street styles and many other looks
description: A piece of America. This modern trucker cap from Stetson is an attractive accessory for your free time. Large mesh inserts ensure excellent air circulation, while the large peak protects against sun glare. Vintage lettering about the Stetson brand and contrast-coloured decorative stitching make this high-quality cap into a real eye-catcher. This means this model is also great for trend-conscious urban outfits. Made of 100% cotton. With size-adjustable snap-back closure.
